reviewComments: This beautiful little church is right in the center of Balboa Island. A good place to attend a weekday Mass. Make sure to get there a little early because it fills up fast... read more
Msgr. Baird is the best. Does a wonderful service. We like it best on a Wednesday as we do not like the longer Sunday Mass. Great family and loving place.
We are staying on Balboa Island, and we can walk to Church. What a convenience! The 9:00am Mass has the Choir and it's a beautiful way to begin your Sunday morning!
